original_text: The moon will shine like the sun, and the sunlight will be seven times brighter, like the light of seven full days, when the Lord binds up the bruises of his people and heals the wounds he inflicted.
korean_text: 여호와께서 자기 백성의 상처를 싸매시며 그들의 맞은 자리를 고치시는 날에는 달빛은 햇빛 같겠고 햇빛은 일곱 배가 되어 일곱 날의 빛과 같으리라

sentences.original_text: The moon will shine like the sun
and the sunlight will be seven times brighter
like the light of seven full days
when the Lord binds up the bruises of his people
sentences.korean_translation: 이는 주께서 그 백성의 상처를 싸매시고

sentences.original_text: and heals the wounds he inflicted
